item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am Niklas, a software developer from Southern Germany. I love to make my daily life easier by programming and to solve daily problems with it. In my spare time I love to take pictures. Other hobbies include event technology and public relations in a Christian youth project.

item.title: New Midas M32 4.0 Firmware
item.description: Introduction Midas released Version 4.0 of its firmware for their great M32 mixer last week. Since I worked quite a bit using the new version, I would like to document some findings here. New Features The new 4.0 release of the M32 firmware brings many new features to the table. The most obvious feature is the much-improved UI. The darker, more flat UI appeals to me much more than the “old” UI of the M32.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy Policy At niklasarnitz.codes, accessible from niklasarnitz.codes, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) We are a Data Controller of your information.
